entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Murdochville
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 16.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 36 this morning and minus 24 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 15. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
